system.description:
A sword of pristine, shining silver with an enchantment effective against the powers of darkness.

  • Used against shades: Acts as a +3 sword against incorporeal creatures of shadow (e.g. spectres, shadows).

  • Whirling the blade: Once per day, the wielder may whirl the blade above their head. This conjures a 60’ radius globe of golden light which lasts for 1 turn.

  • Creatures affected by daylight: Are affected by the globe of light as if it were full daylight.

▶ Creatures affected by daylight: Are affected by the globe of light as if it were full daylight.
